short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use to complete the initial configuration of your Assure X router

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Assure X cloud-managed multi-WAN hybrid router provides seamless network failover from its primary fixed connection to its secondary cellular LTE connection. The switch from the primary to secondary is not only instantaneous, but the static public IP address also stays the same regardless which connection is in use.

Use the Assure X Chrome extension to apply the initial configuration settings to your router in a few simple steps.
